meanings.sent2: I drew an enneagon in geometry class.
meanings.sent3: The enneagon rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace sparkled like an enneagon in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The enneagon stood out among the other shapes on the page.

meanings.sent1: Each angle of the enneagon measures forty degrees.
meanings.sent2: The enneagon's angles add up to three hundred sixty degrees.
meanings.sent3: The enneagon's angles seemed to dance as I moved the paper.
meanings.sent4: His argument had as many angles as an enneagon.
meanings.sent5: The enneagon's angles were sharp and distinct.

meanings.sent1: Counting the corners of the enneagon was a fun math exercise.
meanings.sent2: The enneagon's corners were all perfectly aligned.
meanings.sent3: The enneagon's corners looked like tiny little stars.
meanings.sent4: The enneagon's corners glinted in the candlelight.
meanings.sent5: The enneagon's corners stood out against the smooth edges of the other shapes.
